original_text: But because the Lord loved you, and because he would keep the oath which he had sworn unto your fathers, hath the Lord brought you out with a mighty hand, and redeemed you out of the house of bondmen, from the hand of Pharaoh king of Egypt.
korean_text: 여호와께서 다만 너희를 사랑하심으로 말미암아, 또는 너희의 조상들에게 하신 맹세를 지키려 하심으로 말미암아 자기의 권능의 손으로 너희를 인도하여 내시되 너희를 그 종 되었던 집에서 애굽 왕 바로의 손에서 속량하셨나니

sentences.original_text: But because the Lord loved you
and because he would keep the oath
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그분이 맹세를 지키고자 하셨기 때문에

sentences.original_text: which he had sworn unto your fathers
hath the Lord brought you out
out of the house of bondmen
from the hand of Pharaoh king of Egypt
